title: Self-evaluation as the Reward
formulas: The reward is a 0-1 value based on the evaluation result.
summary: The slide discusses the use of two types of prompts, Correctness Evaluation Prompt (CEP) and Quality Evaluation Prompt (QEP), in Reinforcement Learning and Control (RLC) for self-evaluating self-generated text. The reward is a 0-1 value based on the evaluation result.
